description: SSC has an immediate need to replace UPS batteries that are currently at the end of their life. A bid must comply with all the requirements of the bid solicitation to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.
full_summary:
# Uninterruptible Power Supply Replacement
## Solicitation Information
### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: SSC-24-00028305:T
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM022559/28305
* **Publication Date**: 2024-11-13
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-11-25T14:00:00

### Solicitation Status

* **Tender Status** (French): Ouvert

### Procurement Details
* **Procurement Category**: Canadian National Supply and Tender (CNS/T) and Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Solicitation Description
The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a bid for the replacement of Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) batteries that are currently at the end of their life. The bid must comply with all the requirements of the bid solicitation to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity Name** (English): Shared Services Canada
* **Contact Person**: Raiyane Benchekroun
* **Contact Email**: None
* **Contact Phone Number**: 613 324 4061
* **Contact Fax**: (613) 960-6007
* **Contact Address**: Raiyane Benchekroun 400 Cooper Ottawa, ON K1G 4A8
* **Country**: Canada

### Additional Resources
* **Solicitation Documents**: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/43814744-5782-44A1-9D5F-43966F3B4177

The project description has also been simplified for clarity, highlighting the key points of the request for proposal.\
